news.title: Smashing Pumpkins episode of Hot Press Classics out now
news.summary: Paul Nolan breaks down the Smashing Pumpkins' landmark 1995 double album, <I>Mellon Collie And The Infinite Sadness. Plus, Paul is joined by Kilian Murphy for a discussion about the Pumpkins’ legacy.

news.summary: Check out the project’s title track below

news.title: Trailer released for new Daniel Day Lewis film Anemone
news.summary: The feature will see the actor come out of his 8 year retirement

news.title: Lil Nas X arrested and hospitalised in Los Angeles
news.summary: The rapper's upcoming album Dreamboy is set to release later this year.

news.title: Europass: The free online platform is designed to support your career and learning across the EU
news.summary: Whether you’re looking to work, study or learn a new skill across the EU, Europass is on hand to help.

news.title: Album Review: Mac DeMarco, Guitar
news.summary: Cult star turns on the dark - 8/10

news.title: Album Review: Nourished By Time, The Passionate Ones
news.summary: Baltimore groove tech in flying form. 8/10

news.title: Kid Cudi drops new album Free
news.summary: The project contains singles 'Mr. Miracle', 'Grave' and 'Neverland', with cover art inspired buy The Truman Show

news.title: Nicola Coughlan and Luke Newton awarded TV Moment of the Year at Edinburgh TV Festival
news.summary: Also nominated in the category was fellow Irish actor Saoirse Ronan

news.title: Minding Creative Minds to hold August meet and greet
news.summary: From workshops to meet-and-greets, Minding Creative Minds offers the Irish creative sector an outlet for promoting wellbeing and career advice.
